sources.title: Hasan Kachal (1970) (Musical - Comdedy)
sources.description: Synopsis Hasan is a lazy boy who is in love with "Chelgis", a beautiful girl who is trapped in Div's Garden. To rescue her, Hasan asks his friend Genie to help him. Genie agrees, but in return Hasan has to give him his life. Cast: Parviz Sayyad Nadereh Hasan Khayyatbashi Katayoon Sorayya Beheshti Sadegh Bahrami Yadollah Shirandami Hasan Reziyani Sirous Ebrahimzadeh
